Thai journalists arrested for news coverage of anarchist graffiti on templeTwo Thai journalists have been arrested for their story about an activist spray painting an anarchist symbol and a symbol critical of "lese majeste" laws on a Bangkok temple wall almost a year ago, the police and their lawyers said on Tuesday. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 05:41:54 GMT CNJTVY2OKRO3BK42A52MXAGMTM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thai-journalists-arrested-news-coverage-anarchist-graffiti-temple-2024-02-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
Indian farmers to march to Delhi after talks with ministers failIndian farmers plan to continue a protest march to New Delhi on Tuesday after talks with ministers failed to make progress on issues including better crop prices promised in 2021 when thousands camped on highways leading to the capital. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 05:26:23 GMT PM3RE6LW7ZOZVHXFQFWECKPMUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indian-farmers-march-delhi-after-talks-with-ministers-fail-2024-02-13/Reuters世界印度
Three COP summit hosts unite to raise climate ambitionsThe United Arab Emirates, host of last year's COP28 climate summit, and Azerbaijan and Brazil, the hosts of the next two U.N. climate summits, said on Tuesday they would team up to push for more ambitious emissions-cutting goals. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 05:09:34 GMT 3AML3E7K6JJIJCE7UDT77GOA3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/third-cop-summit-hosts-unite-raise-climate-ambitions-2024-02-13/Kate Abnett可持续发展气候与能源
Indonesia in final stretch ahead of world's biggest single-day electionAuthorities making final preparations ahead of Wednesday's election, with around 25,000 police set to ensure security in a contest seen as a test of democratic gains since the end of authoritarian rule 25 years ago. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 04:14:59 GMT NCWPRMKD3FIVVGX5IP5OXFH2YM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-final-stretch-ahead-worlds-biggest-single-day-election-2024-02-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
Delayed Tuvalu election result highlights climate impactsAn election result in Tuvalu has been delayed by two weeks as dangerous weather stops boats from bringing new lawmakers to the capital to vote for prime minister, highlighting why climate change is the top political issue in the Pacific Islands nation. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 03:38:05 GMT C56YI5U4J5P2JPGHGJOMJHBBDY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/delayed-tuvalu-election-result-highlights-climate-impacts-2024-02-13/Kirsty Needham可持续发展气候与能源
Jailed former Thai leader Thaksin granted parole, PM saysThailand's controversial billionaire former premier Thaksin Shinawatra has been granted parole after serving six months in detention, the prime minister said Tuesday, while highlighting his service to the country. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 03:28:05 GMT RMHN54CPMJMJFFGZFH25RJVDOU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/jailed-former-thai-pm-thaksin-granted-parole-local-media-2024-02-13/Panarat Thepgumpanat, Chayut Setboonsarng世界亚太地区
US, Jordan throw their weight behind Gaza ceasefire effort ahead of new talksU.S. President Joe Biden and Jordan's King Abdullah kept up pressure for a Gaza Strip ceasefire as senior mediators were to resume work on Tuesday on an Israel-Hamas truce agreement, with the threat of an Israeli ground offensive looming in Rafah. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 00:13:58 GMT UBSWQWDUUZKOJPJUAPJX64X74Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-jordan- throw-their-weight-behind-gaza-ceasefire-effort-ahead-new-talks-2024-02-13/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Emily Rose, Trevor Hunnicutt世界中东
Stranded livestock land in Australia after Red Sea turn-back and weeks at seaThousands of sheep and cattle stuck on a ship that was forced to abandon a passage through the Red Sea last month have begun disembarking at the same Australian port they left nearly six weeks ago, Australia's agriculture ministry said late on Monday. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 00:08:35 GMT J3WLSNJRRFPCLE4OKJ4KLVNGUU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/stranded-livestock-land-australia-after-red-sea-turn-back-weeks-sea-2024-02-13/Peter Hobson世界亚太地区
Canadian-Russian woman pleads guilty in US to sending military components to RussiaA Canadian-Russian woman on Monday pleaded guilty in a U.S. court to money laundering conspiracy for her role in a multimillion-dollar scheme to send drone and missile components to Russia for military use against Ukraine, the U.S. Justice Department said. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 23:49:27 GMT H7ONDLIJBBNAHKLGHDNUCV6H3A https://www.reuters.com/world/canadian- Russian-woman-pleads-guilty-us-sending-military-components-Russia-2024-02-12/Kanishka Singh世界
Exclusive: France proposes Hezbollah withdrawal, border talks for Israel-Lebanon truceFrance has delivered a written proposal to Beirut aimed at ending hostilities with Israel and settling the disputed Lebanon-Israel frontier, according to a document seen by Reuters that calls for fighters including Hezbollah's elite unit to withdraw 10 km (6 miles) from the border. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 23:25:33 GMT GWCIOZZRHVLC7O2WDN3P26VDRY https://www.reuters.com/world/france-proposes-hezbollah-withdrawal-border-talks-israel-lebanon-truce-2024-02-12/Laila Bassam, Maya Gebeily, John Irish世界
New York subway shooting kills one after brawl erupts on trainNew York City police said they are searching for a gunman who opened fire on a subway train and station platform in the Bronx on Monday, killing one man and injuring five other people. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 23:20:00 GMT RMODHTT7RVOQLHY6N5WHN3VRDQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/multiple-people-shot-new-york-city-subway-bronx-2024-02-12/Jonathan Allen, Brad Brooks世界美国
